body.p: Synopsys GitLab Template allows you to configure your GitLab pipeline to run Synopsys security testing and act on the results.
Synopsys GitLab Template Marketplace link is https://gitlab.com/synopsys/synopsys-template.

section.title: Additional information
section.p: For additional GitLab integration information, see:

li.xref: Using Synopsys GitLab Template with Polaris
Using the Synopsys GitLab Template with Black Duck
Using the Synopsys GitLab Template for Coverity Cloud Deployment with Thin Client
